demos.title: DI: Inject & Provide
demos.teaches: Use the inject() function to retrieve registered dependencies in a component. Learn how to provide custom services and configure injection tokens.

demos.title: App Initialization
demos.teaches: Configure application startup behavior using APP_INITIALIZER tokens. Run setup logic before the application bootstraps.

demos.title: Component Input Bindings
demos.teaches: Bind route parameters directly to component inputs using bindToComponentInputs strategy. Simplify parameter handling with signal-based inputs.

demos.title: NgRx Router State
demos.teaches: Access router state through NgRx store. Manage navigation history and route parameters in application state.

demos.title: Route Titles
demos.teaches: Set dynamic page titles for each route using the title property in route configuration. Update browser tab titles automatically.

demos.title: Router Animations
demos.teaches: Add smooth transitions between route components using Angular animations. Enhance navigation UX with view enter/exit effects.

demos.title: View Transitions
demos.teaches: Leverage native View Transitions API for seamless animated navigation. Create shared element animations across route changes.

demos.title: CanMatch Guard
demos.teaches: Use canMatch guards to conditionally load routes based on runtime conditions. Prevent route initialization before matching.

demos.title: Route Guards
demos.teaches: Stack multiple route guards to enforce authorization policies. Combine authentication and role-based access control.

demos.title: Preloading Strategy
demos.teaches: Implement custom preloading strategies to eager-load routes in the background. Optimize performance with selective preloading.

demos.title: HTTP Resource
demos.teaches: Fetch data declaratively using the resource() function with signal-based reactive requests. Manage loading and error states automatically.

demos.title: HTTP Interceptors
demos.teaches: Create multiple HTTP interceptors to add cross-cutting concerns like auth headers, logging, and error handling. Chain interceptors for request/response transformation.

demos.title: HTTP Error Handler
demos.teaches: Create interceptors that catch and transform HTTP errors. Implement centralized error recovery strategies.

demos.title: Global Error Handler
demos.teaches: Implement a global error handler using ErrorHandler token. Catch and log all application errors in one place.

demos.title: NgRx Data Preload
demos.teaches: Use NgRx to preload route data before component initialization. Leverage store selectors for optimized data fetching.

demos.title: NgRx Router Actions
demos.teaches: Dispatch router-related actions through NgRx store. Coordinate navigation with application state management.
